Purpose: High-level migration status and key decisions
Agenda Topics: Migration health, wave progress, risks, budget status
Success Metrics: Report delivered on time and decisions made
Notes: Executive summary with migration KPIs and cost metrics

Purpose: Strategic migration direction and issue resolution
Agenda Topics: Migration strategy, major risks, budget, timeline adjustments
Success Metrics: Meeting attendance >80% and decisions documented
Notes: Decision-making authority for migration scope and priorities

Purpose: Daily coordination and impediment removal
Agenda Topics: Wave progress, blockers, daily migration tasks
Success Metrics: Daily attendance >90% and blockers resolved
Notes: Focus on migration dependencies and coordination

Purpose: AWS architecture design review and approval
Agenda Topics: Architecture decisions, AWS service selection, security design
Success Metrics: Design decisions made and AWS best practices followed
Notes: Include AWS Well-Architected Framework reviews

Purpose: Migration risk assessment and mitigation planning
Agenda Topics: Migration risks, dependency issues, rollback planning
Success Metrics: Risk register updated and mitigations on track
Notes: Focus on migration-specific risks and dependencies

Purpose: Migration impact and readiness communication
Agenda Topics: Migration schedule, application changes, user impact
Success Metrics: User awareness and readiness for migration waves
Notes: Include application-specific migration timelines

Purpose: AWS infrastructure progress and configuration
Agenda Topics: Landing zone progress, security config, monitoring setup
Key Stakeholders: Cloud Ops Team and AWS TAM
Success Metrics: AWS environments ready and security validated
Notes: Include AWS service configurations and cost optimization

Purpose: Individual wave planning and execution coordination
Agenda Topics: Wave status, application dependencies, cutover planning
Key Stakeholders: Wave Team Members and App Owners
Success Metrics: Wave milestones met and applications migrated successfully
Notes: Intensive coordination during active migration waves

Purpose: Database and data migration progress
Agenda Topics: Data sync status, validation results, cutover readiness
Success Metrics: Data migration completed with zero data loss
Notes: Include data validation and synchronization metrics

Purpose: Cloud security compliance and risk assessment
Agenda Topics: Security assessments, compliance validation, vulnerability management
Success Metrics: Security requirements met and compliance validated
Notes: Include AWS security services and compliance frameworks

Purpose: Hybrid network connectivity and performance
Agenda Topics: Connectivity status, bandwidth utilization, routing optimization
Success Metrics: Network connectivity stable and performance optimized
Notes: Include AWS Direct Connect and VPN performance

Purpose: Migration change request review and approval
Agenda Topics: Migration changes, impact assessment, approval decisions
Success Metrics: Migration changes processed within SLA
Notes: Follow migration-specific change management process

Purpose: Cloud skills training and readiness
Agenda Topics: Training progress, cloud certification, knowledge transfer
Success Metrics: Team cloud readiness and certification targets met
Notes: Include AWS training and certification progress

Purpose: AWS TAM and vendor integration coordination
Agenda Topics: AWS support, vendor deliverables, integration progress
Success Metrics: Vendor commitments met and AWS support effective
Notes: Track AWS Professional Services and partner SLAs

Purpose: Migration testing progress and quality metrics
Agenda Topics: Test execution, performance validation, rollback testing
Success Metrics: Migration quality gates met and performance validated
Notes: Include migration-specific testing and validation results

Purpose: AWS cost monitoring and optimization
Agenda Topics: AWS cost analysis, right-sizing, reserved instance planning
Success Metrics: AWS costs optimized and within budget targets
Notes: Include AWS cost explorer and optimization recommendations

Purpose: Application migration readiness and validation
Agenda Topics: App dependencies, data cutover, user acceptance testing
Success Metrics: Applications ready for migration and validated
Notes: Critical coordination before each application migration

Purpose: Migration wave go-live planning and execution
Agenda Topics: Cutover status, rollback decisions, issue escalation
Success Metrics: Successful cutover with minimal downtime
Notes: Intensive coordination during production cutover

Purpose: Post-migration review and optimization
Agenda Topics: Migration performance, optimization opportunities, lessons learned
Success Metrics: Migration benefits realized and optimizations identified
Notes: Include cloud cost analysis and performance optimization

Purpose: Critical migration issue communication and resolution
Agenda Topics: Issue description, business impact, resolution actions
Success Metrics: Migration issues resolved within SLA
Notes: Follow migration incident management procedures

Purpose: AWS technical support and guidance coordination
Agenda Topics: Technical guidance, service limits, architecture validation
Success Metrics: AWS support responsive and technical guidance effective
Notes: Leverage AWS Technical Account Manager and support

Purpose: Business impact assessment and continuity planning
Agenda Topics: Business impact, continuity plans, disaster recovery testing
Success Metrics: Business continuity maintained during migration
Notes: Include disaster recovery testing and business impact analysis

Purpose: Migration to operations transition planning
Agenda Topics: Operations readiness, runbook review, support transition
Success Metrics: Smooth transition to operations with documented procedures
Notes: Include cloud operations training and knowledge transfer

Purpose: General migration updates and milestone communication
Agenda Topics: Migration progress, upcoming waves, team recognition
Success Metrics: Stakeholder engagement and migration awareness maintained
Notes: Include migration achievements and cloud benefits realization
